div.p: The clinical status of the Condition or diagnosis
This value set defines its own terms in the system http://hl7.org/fhir/condition-status

tr.td: This is a tentative diagnosis - still a candidate that is under consideration.
The patient is being treated on the basis that this is the condition, but it is still not confirmed.
There is sufficient diagnostic and/or clinical evidence to treat this as a confirmed condition.
This condition has been ruled out by diagnostic and clinical evidence.
